sch:pattern.name: UBLExtensions
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the UBLExtensions class

sch:pattern.name: Profile
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating root element, Profile and UBL version

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-ORE218] The documenttype does not match an OIOUBL OrderResponse and can not be validated by this schematron.

sch:pattern.name: OrderResponse
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the OrderResponse structure

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-ORE006] Invalid ID. Must contain a value
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-ORE007] No more than one ValidityPeriod class may be present
[F-ORE008] No more than one OrderReference class may be present
[F-ORE009] No more than one Contract class may be present
[F-ORE010] No more than one Signature class may be present
[F-ORE011] No more than one Delivery class may be present
[F-ORE014] There is a PriceAmount where the currencyID does not equal the PricingCurrencyCode
[F-ORE015] There is a TaxAmount where the currencyID does not equal the TaxCurrencyCode
sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-ORE016] TaxCurrencyCode must be either DKK or EUR

sch:pattern.name: ValidityPeriod
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the ValidityPeriod class

sch:pattern.name: OrderReference
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the OrderReference class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-ORE017] Invalid ID. Must contain a value

sch:pattern.name: AdditionalDocumentReference
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the AdditionalDocumentReference class

sch:pattern.name: Contract
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the Contract class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-ORE022] Invalid ID. Must contain a value
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-ORE023] Use either ContractType or ContractTypeCode

sch:pattern.name: Signature
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the Signature class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-ORE024] Invalid ID. Must contain a value

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-ORE025] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present

sch:pattern.name: SellerSupplierParty
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the SellerSupplierParty class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-ORE028] Invalid EndpointID. Must contain a value
[F-ORE029] One PartyLegalEntity class must be present

sch:pattern.name: BuyerCustomerParty
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the BuyerCustomerParty class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-ORE032] One Party class must be present
[F-ORE033] Invalid EndpointID. Must contain a value
[F-ORE034] One Contact class must be present
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-ORE035] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-ORE036] Invalid ID. Must contain a value

sch:pattern.name: OriginatorCustomerParty
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the OriginatorCustomerParty class

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-ORE038] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present

sch:pattern.name: FreightForwarderParty
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the FreightForwarderParty class

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-ORE039] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present

sch:pattern.name: AccountingSupplierParty
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the AccountingSupplierParty class

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-ORE042] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present

sch:pattern.name: AccountingCustomerParty
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the AccountingCustomerParty class

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-ORE044] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present

sch:pattern.name: Delivery
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the Delivery class

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-ORE056] Address is mandatory when ID is not specified
[F-ORE057] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present

sch:pattern.name: DeliveryTerms
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the DeliveryTerms class

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-ORE059] Use either ID or SpecialTerms
[W-ORE060] If used, use INCO terms (ID = 'INCOTERMS')
[F-ORE061] Use either LossRiskResponsibilityCode or LossRisk

sch:pattern.name: PaymentMeans
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the PaymentMeans class

sch:pattern.name: AllowanceCharge
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the AllowanceCharge class

sch:pattern.name: TransactionConditions
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the TransactionConditions class

sch:pattern.name: DestinationCountry
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the DestinationCountry class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-ORE062] Invalid IdentificationCode. Must contain a value

sch:pattern.name: TaxTotal
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the TaxTotal class

sch:pattern.name: LegalMonetaryTotal
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the LegalMonetaryTotal class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-ORE063] Invalid LineExtensionAmount. Must contain a value
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-ORE065] AllowanceTotalAmount is mandatory when AllowanceCharge classes (with ChargeIndicator='false') are present
[F-ORE066] ChargeTotalAmount is mandatory when AllowanceCharge classes (with ChargeIndicator='true') are present
[F-ORE067] PrepaidAmount is mandatory when PrepaidPayment/PaidAmount elements are present
[F-ORE068] PayableRoundingAmount is mandatory when TaxTotal/RoundingAmount elements are present
[F-ORE069] The sum of Orderline/LineItem/LineExtensionAmount elements must equal LineExtensionAmount
[F-ORE070] The sum of TaxTotal/TaxSubtotal/TaxAmount elements must equal TaxExclusiveAmount
[F-ORE071] TaxInclusiveAmount is calculated incorrectly
[F-ORE072] The sum of AllowanceCharge/Amount elements (with ChargeIndicator='false') must equal AllowanceTotalAmount
[F-ORE073] The sum of AllowanceCharge/Amount elements (with ChargeIndicator='true') must equal cbc:ChargeTotalAmount
[F-ORE074] The sum of PrepaidPayment/PaidAmount elements must equal PrepaidAmount
[F-ORE075] The sum of TaxTotal/RoundingAmount elements must equal PayableRoundingAmount

sch:pattern.name: OrderLine
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the OrderLine class

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-ORE210] Only use Delivery.LatestDeliveryDate if not specified on header level (OrderResponse.Delivery)
[F-ORE211] Only use Delivery.LatestDeliveryTime if not specified on header level (OrderResponse.Delivery)
[F-ORE215] Only use Delivery.DeliveryLocation if not specified on header level (OrderResponse.Delivery)
[F-ORE216] Only use Delivery.DeliveryParty if not specified on header level (OrderResponse.Delivery)
[W-ORE080] ID must be unique within the document instance

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-ORE207] Invalid SubstitutionStatusCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-ORE217] AllowanceCharge.Amount can not be negative, if Quantity or Price.PriceAmount are not negative.
[F-ORE217] AllowanceCharge.Amount can not be negative, if Quantity or Price.PriceAmount are not negative.
sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-ORE082] Invalid ID. Must contain a value
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-ORE090] When present, LineExtensionAmount must equal Quantity * Price.PriceAmount (when OrderableUnitFactorRate not present)

sch:report.test: (not($L) and not($T)) and ((cbc:LineExtensionAmount < (cbc:Quantity * cac:Price/cbc:PriceAmount * cac:Price/cbc:OrderableUnitFactorRate - 01.00)) or (cbc:LineExtensionAmount > (cbc:Quantity * cac:Price/cbc:PriceAmount * cac:Price/cbc:OrderableUnitFactorRate + 01.00)))

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-ORE143] When present, LineExtensionAmount must equal Quantity * Price.PriceAmount * Price.OrderableUnitFactorRate

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-ORE208] Invalid LineStatusCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-ORE085] Invalid Quantity. Must have at least 2 decimals
sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-ORE087] Invalid Quantity. Must not be zero

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-ORE088] Invalid LineExtensionAmount. Must have at least 2 decimals
[F-ORE089] Invalid LineExtensionAmount. No more than 4 decimals
[F-ORE095] Address is mandatory when ID is not specified
[F-ORE096] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present
[F-ORE098] Use either ID or SpecialTerms
[W-ORE099] If used, use INCO terms (ID = 'Incoterms')
[F-ORE100] Use either LossRiskResponsibilityCode or LossRisk
[F-ORE101] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present
[F-ORE130] No more than one TradingRestrictions element may be present
[F-ORE131] No more than one ValidityPeriod class may be present
[F-ORE132] Invalid PriceAmount. Must have at least 2 decimals
sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-ORE133] Invalid PriceAmount. Must not be negative

sch:rule.sch:report: [W-ORE134] The attribute languageID should be used when more than one PriceChangeReason element is present
[W-ORE135] Multilanguage error. Replicated PriceChangeReason elements with same languageID attribute value
[F-ORE137] No more than one ValidityPeriod class may be present
[F-ORE138] Invalid PriceAmount. Must have at least 2 decimals
sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-ORE139] Invalid PriceAmount. Must not be negative

sch:rule.sch:report: [W-ORE140] The attribute languageID should be used when more than one PriceChangeReason element is present
[W-ORE141] Multilanguage error. Replicated PriceChangeReason elements with same languageID attribute value
[F-ORE103] Invalid PriceAmount. Must have at least 2 decimals
[F-ORE104] Invalid PriceAmount. No more than 4 decimals
[W-ORE106] The attribute languageID should be used when more than one PriceChangeReason element is present
[W-ORE107] Multilanguage error. Replicated PriceChangeReason elements with same languageID attribute value

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-ORE111] Invalid Name. Must contain a value
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-ORE112] There must be a SellersItemIdentification class for this profileID

sch:report.test: not(cbc:Description) and not(cac:BuyersItemIdentification) and not(cac:SellersItemIdentification) and not(cac:ManufacturersItemIdentification) and not(cac:StandardItemIdentification) and not(cac:CatalogueItemIdentification) and not(cac:AdditionalItemIdentification)

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-ORE114] Description is mandatory if no ItemIdentification is present

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-ORE115] Invalid ID. Must contain a value
[F-ORE116] Invalid Description. Must contain a value
[F-ORE117] Invalid AttributeID. Must contain a value
[F-ORE118] Invalid AttributeID. Must contain a value

sch:rule.sch:report: [W-ORE119] Use a Valid UNSPSC 19.0501 code

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-ORE120] Invalid Name. Must contain a value
[F-ORE121] Invalid Value. Must contain a value
[F-ORE122] Invalid ID. Must contain a value
[F-ORE123] Invalid Name. Must contain a value
[F-ORE124] Invalid Value. Must contain a value
[F-ORE125] Invalid ID. Must contain a value
[F-ORE126] Invalid Name. Must contain a value
[F-ORE127] Invalid Value. Must contain a value
[F-ORE128] Invalid ID. Must contain a value
[F-ORE146] Invalid ID. Must contain a value
[F-ORE149] Invalid LineStatusCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-ORE150] Invalid Quantity. Must have at least 2 decimals
[F-ORE151] Invalid Quantity. No more than 4 decimals
sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-ORE152] Invalid Quantity. Must not be zero

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-ORE153] Invalid LineExtensionAmount. Must have at least 2 decimals
[F-ORE154] Invalid LineExtensionAmount. No more than 4 decimals
[F-ORE159] Address is mandatory when ID is not specified
[F-ORE160] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present
[F-ORE162] Use either ID or SpecialTerms
[W-ORE163] If used, use INCO terms (ID = 'Incoterms')
[F-ORE164] Use either LossRiskResponsibilityCode or LossRisk
[F-ORE165] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present
[F-ORE166] No more than one TradingRestrictions element may be present
[F-ORE167] No more than one ValidityPeriod class may be present
[F-ORE168] Invalid PriceAmount. Must have at least 2 decimals
[W-ORE169] The attribute languageID should be used when more than one PriceChangeReason element is present
[W-ORE170] Multilanguage error. Replicated PriceChangeReason elements with same languageID attribute value
[F-ORE172] No more than one ValidityPeriod class may be present
[F-ORE173] Invalid PriceAmount. Must have at least 2 decimals
sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-ORE174] Invalid PriceAmount. Must not be negative

sch:rule.sch:report: [W-ORE175] The attribute languageID should be used when more than one PriceChangeReason element is present
[W-ORE176] Multilanguage error. Replicated PriceChangeReason elements with same languageID attribute value
[F-ORE179] Invalid PriceAmount. Must have at least 2 decimals
[F-ORE180] Invalid PriceAmount. No more than 4 decimals
sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-ORE181] Invalid PriceAmount. Must not be negative

sch:rule.sch:report: [W-ORE182] The attribute languageID should be used when more than one PriceChangeReason element is present
[W-ORE183] Multilanguage error. Replicated PriceChangeReason elements with same languageID attribute value

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-ORE187] Invalid Name. Must contain a value
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-ORE188] There must be a SellersItemIdentification class for this profileID

sch:report.test: not(cbc:Description) and not(cac:BuyersItemIdentification) and not(cac:SellersItemIdentification) and not(cac:ManufacturersItemIdentification) and not(cac:StandardItemIdentification) and not(cac:CatalogueItemIdentification) and not(cac:AdditionalItemIdentification)

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-ORE190] Description is mandatory if no ItemIdentification is present

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-ORE191] Invalid ID. Must contain a value
[F-ORE192] Invalid Description. Must contain a value
[F-ORE193] Invalid AttributeID. Must contain a value
[F-ORE194] Invalid AttributeID. Must contain a value

sch:rule.sch:report: [W-ORE195] Use a Valid UNSPSC 19.0501 code

[F-ORE197] Invalid Value. Must contain a value
